author: taylor
msg: casting to DatabasePageManager from Spring proxy was failing in BaseElementImpl due to a class cast exception. This exception *should* never happen, yet it occurred during load testing on a cluster. This fix required moving around some classes, introducing interfaces, so we could properly cast through the  Spring interface contract
